document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">"Heart's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Ease"! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">dont </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">care </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">pouting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">skies! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Butterfly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">delay </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">therefore, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">stay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Coward </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Bumble </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Bee </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">chimney </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">corner </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">stay, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">resoluter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who'll </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">apologize </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Dear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Old </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">fashioned, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">flower! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Eden </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">old </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">fashioned, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Birds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">antiquated </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">fellows! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">does </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">change </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">blue. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">Heart's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Ease </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Ever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">induced </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">do! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: I'm the little "Heart's Ease"!
